channel.title: Error Connecting
channel.description:
^^ Thanks for looking at my post. Okay, I just downloaded a source and client, and P-Fowarded and used port-checker tool to confirm that is was 'open.' I changed my IP in client.java in the client, and I can connect to the server but...my friends can't. Please pm or reply to this. I also have skype and teamviewer.
Skype:J For Jawsh

item.title: Error Connecting
item.dc:creator: @J_for_jawsh J for jawsh
item.description:
@J_for_jawsh wrote:

^^ Thanks for looking at my post.
Okay, I just downloaded a source and client, and P-Fowarded and used port-checker tool to confirm that is was ‘open.’ I changed my IP in client.java in the client, and I can connect to the server but…my friends can’t. Please pm or reply to this. I also have skype and teamviewer.

Skype:J For Jawsh
